channel.title: Need help with Case's. @ @ @ @
channel.description:
How do you correctly add stuff to cases?
And could someone explain a little bit about how they work, and what exactly a case is.
E.G: [code]case 4755: { entergw(); } break;[/code]
how would I add say, a command into that?
because i've tried multiple ways and keep getting various errors such as orphaned case (what does that mean)
Thanks.

item.title: Need help with Case's. @ @ @ @
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

No one even mentioned that it’s part of a switch statement and that it changes the number of the case to whatever variable you’re using as the switch…

Read full topic

item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

With this -

case 4755: entergw(); break;

You must have this -

public boolean entergw() { Whatever...

item.title: Need help with Case's. @ @ @ @
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“Surfr, post:1, topic:268747”]How do you correctly add stuff to cases?

And could someone explain a little bit about how they work, and what exactly a case is.

E.G:

case 4755: { entergw(); } break;

how would I add say, a command into that?

because i’ve tried multiple ways and keep getting various errors such as orphaned case (what does that mean)

Thanks.[/quote]

First,

case 4755: { entergw(); } break;

First, the 4755.
This is the object or tab or whatever you want to click and make it do something for you.
So for example, if I wanted to make a chest give me, lets say, 5000 gp, I would put this:

case chestid

The “chestid” would obviously be changed to the chest’s id.
Now for the 5000gp part, You would add

addItem(995, 5000);

This part tells your server to give you 5k gp.
now, lets say you want it to send you a message.
You would now type in something like this:

sendMessage("You recieve 5000gp");

This part of the code tells it to send you a message that you recieve your gp.
Now say you wanted to end it.
You would put

break;

So all together it would look like this:

case chestid:
addItem(995, 5000);
sendMessage("You receive 5000 gp!");
break;

Read full topic
